query: Rare, experimental sci-fi/dystopian film with surreal elements, possibly Russian, from the 60s or 70s, featuring wide shots in winter settings, strange costumes, and a unique, almost otherworldly color palette. Known for its rarity, with only one poor-quality print available, and not typically found in lists of "best weird movies" or "you've never seen this!" compilations.

"Movie about a Caucasian male dwarf, possibly a writer or editor, who falls in love with a red-haired woman after reconnecting with her from childhood, despite facing prejudice and sometimes turning to alcohol. They dance on a balcony or rooftop in white dresses in the final scene, possibly at their wedding."

"1990s English-language movie featuring two young women who commit a brutal murder in a home, have sex on the bloodied bed, and possibly engage in other transgressive acts such as breaking into an elderly woman's trailer home and molesting her, with one scene involving a shower sex scene."

Film possibly depicting occult themes, featuring a woman in labor with arms and legs tied, a dream sequence of a young woman imagining being the birthing mother's child or a small creature entering her belly through the navel, and a scene of the young woman on an altar shaped like a cross. Age of viewer is unspecified.
Little white boy who bragged about robbing houses, caught by homeowners, and sets his own apartment on fire, with working mother.
"Mafia movie featuring a silent man in a hotel, who is confronted by a woman in a cafe and receives a visit from two men with a bag, released before 2013 and dubbed."
Movie featuring a man getting split in half by an unseen force, possibly nudity, and a dark scene with a nude woman, shown 6-7 years ago.

"Sci-fi movie from the mid 80s featuring a scientist or robotic engineer uncovering an evil plot, escaping a lab, returning home to an American city, revealing his girlfriend as a robot clone who tries to kill him, fleeing to a rural farm with a son and daughter, and ending with the son robot driving a front-end loader and being electrocuted."

"1980s or 1990s light comedy film featuring two adventurers in an Indiana Jones-like setting, captured by enemy forces, with a villain who says the line 'gentlemen, we meet again' and finds it amusing."

Romantic comedy movie from at least 10 years ago featuring a first date scene at a burger stand where the male character expresses anxiety about getting a kiss and the female character initiates a kiss.

"Indie film starring a couple with a cat, featuring Annie Clark as the female lead, discussing their 5-year relationship and feeling stagnant in life. Old kid adventure movie featuring a giant metal robot guarding a hill, with a cave behind or underneath the machine, containing a white flower growing on a small hill in the center of the cave.

Crime/Thriller film set in Hong Kong, possibly from the 80's or 90's, featuring a woman impersonating a nurse to kidnap and kill a hospitalized person, with scenes of the nurse being tied up and struggling in her underwear, and men in suits standing in the hallway outside the hospital room.

English movie from the 2000s featuring a scene where two masked men follow, capture, and assault a woman near a train bridge. The man who rapes her removes his mask, and the other man says "Let her go." after acknowledging she saw his face.

Netflix movie from the past three years, possibly released in the 90s, in color, with English dialogue, directed by Tim Burton-esque style, featuring a seaside inn where residents are ill due to poor food, improving when they start eating better, and possibly involving a boat at the end of the pier as a means of transportation off the island.

Teen romance movie from 2006 on Sky 306, featuring a boy with unrequited love for a girl, blonde hair, and purple attire. The plot includes a scene where the boy imagines attacking or diverting another boy into a dumpster, a karate practice scene, and a dance scene at a family event without dialogue. The title may contain a number or the letter Q.

Old thriller movie featuring a woman in an antique shop, looking out the window at two creepy-looking little girls jumping rope and chanting a nursery rhyme, possibly with a second woman, and the woman expressing fear or horror about the children. Possible setting: 1960s.
Black and white movie featuring angels arriving from heaven via hotel elevator, with long waits in the lobby and frequent elevator status changes.

army reservist neighbor living next to homebound young woman

American comedy movie (1990-2014) featuring a famous character seeking temporary shelter, leading to a humorous situation where he inadvertently witnesses his host's wife cheating on him with the celebrity, causing the husband's excitement and acceptance.

The crew leader insists they can complete the data collection in time, despite warnings to leave. Color, silent short film or opening scene from a movie released in the last two years, featuring a pregnant cave woman who gives birth alone, wanders and starves, eats raw eggs to breastfeed, hides her baby in brush, and fights off a predator to protect it, possibly dying at the end.

film about a girl who pays tribute to her deceased mother in a crocodile-infested lake, discovers her mother is alive, has a rival from college claiming to be her step-sister, and receives a low salary. The girl stars in the film and the plot involves her throwing her father out of a plane or helicopter at the end.

Boy, meets wolf and pink bunny-like creature on journey to find wizard, who turns out to be a little girl, to defeat colorful hyenas. The hyenas have captured his town and mother. The wolf turns into a human, and the mosquito on the boy's shoulder says wizards are old men with long beards. The boy uses a mirror given by the wizard to realize he has the power to defeat the hyenas.

1980s English-language movie featuring little white humanoid creatures with green or red faces, set in an underground cave, with an unexpected ending involving a bus and a shooting death.

Animated movie (consisting of multiple short stories) that aired on Netflix between 2009 and 2015, featuring a boy and a girl in an old theater, an owl, and costume changes via a scanning platform. Plots include a boy wrongly accused of theft, imprisonment, a princess's pity, an evil sister's plot to marry him, a curse to become a wolf, slaying a dragon, saving a dying clan chief with drum playing, and choosing a bride with the help of a bee.
